And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> they came nigh<S>1448</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, unto<S>1519</S> Bethphage<S>967</S> and<S>2532</S> Bethany<S>963</S>, at<S>4314</S> the mount<S>3735</S> of Olives<S>1636</S>, he sendeth forth<S>649</S> two<S>1417</S> of his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>,
And<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Go your way<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> the village<S>2968</S> over against<S>2713</S> you<S>5216</S>: and<S>2532</S> as soon as<S>2112</S> ye be entered<S>1531</S> into<S>1519</S> it<S>846</S>, ye shall find<S>2147</S> a colt<S>4454</S> tied<S>1210</S>, whereon<S>1909</S> <S>3739</S> never<S>3762</S> man<S>444</S> sat<S>2523</S>; loose<S>3089</S> him<S>846</S>, and bring<S>71</S> him.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> say<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Why<S>5101</S> do ye<S>4160</S> this<S>5124</S>? say ye<S>2036</S> that<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> hath<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S> of him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> he will send<S>649</S> him<S>846</S> hither<S>5602</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they went their way<S>565</S>, and<S>2532</S> found<S>2147</S> the colt<S>4454</S> tied<S>1210</S> by<S>4314</S> the door<S>2374</S> without<S>1854</S> in<S>1909</S> a place where two ways met<S>296</S>; and<S>2532</S> they loose<S>3089</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> certain of them<S>5100</S> that stood<S>2476</S> there<S>1563</S> said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, What<S>5101</S> do ye<S>4160</S>, loosing<S>3089</S> the colt<S>4454</S>?
And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S> even as<S>2531</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had commanded<S>1781</S>: and<S>2532</S> they let<S>863</S> them<S>846</S> go<S>863</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they brought<S>71</S> the colt<S>4454</S> to<S>4314</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast<S>1911</S> their<S>846</S> garments<S>2440</S> on<S>1911</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> he sat<S>2523</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> many<S>4183</S> spread<S>4766</S> their<S>846</S> garments<S>2440</S> in<S>1519</S> the way<S>3598</S>: and<S>1161</S> others<S>243</S> cut down<S>2875</S> branches<S>4746</S> off<S>1537</S> the trees<S>1186</S>, and<S>2532</S> strawed<S>4766</S> them in<S>1519</S> the way<S>3598</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they that went before<S>4254</S>, and<S>2532</S> they that followed<S>190</S>, cried<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Hosanna<S>5614</S>; Blessed<S>2127</S> is he that cometh<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>:
Blessed<S>2127</S> be the kingdom<S>932</S> of our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S> David<S>1138</S>, that cometh<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>: Hosanna<S>5614</S> in<S>1722</S> the highest<S>5310</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>, and<S>2532</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he had looked round about upon<S>4017</S> all things<S>3956</S>, and now<S>2235</S> the eventide<S>3798</S> <S>5610</S> was come<S>5607</S>, he went out<S>1831</S> unto<S>1519</S> Bethany<S>963</S> with<S>3326</S> the twelve<S>1427</S>.
And<S>2532</S> on the morrow<S>1887</S>, when they<S>846</S> were come<S>1831</S> from<S>575</S> Bethany<S>963</S>, he was hungry<S>3983</S>:
And<S>2532</S> seeing<S>1492</S> a fig tree<S>4808</S> afar off<S>3113</S> having<S>2192</S> leaves<S>5444</S>, he came<S>2064</S>, if<S>1487</S> haply<S>686</S> he might find<S>2147</S> any thing<S>5100</S> thereon<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> when he came<S>2064</S> to<S>1909</S> it<S>846</S>, he found<S>2147</S> nothing<S>3762</S> but<S>1508</S> leaves<S>5444</S>; for<S>1063</S> the time<S>2540</S> of figs<S>4810</S> was<S>2258</S> not<S>3756</S> yet.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto it<S>846</S>, No man<S>3367</S> eat<S>5315</S> fruit<S>2590</S> of<S>1537</S> thee<S>4675</S> hereafter<S>3371</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>. And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> heard<S>191</S> it.
And<S>2532</S> they come<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>: and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and began<S>756</S> to cast out<S>1544</S> them that sold<S>4453</S> and<S>2532</S> bought<S>59</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> overthrew<S>2690</S> the tables<S>5132</S> of the moneychangers<S>2855</S>, and<S>2532</S> the seats<S>2515</S> of them<S>846</S> that sold<S>4453</S> doves<S>4058</S>;
And<S>2532</S> would<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> suffer<S>863</S> that<S>2443</S> any man<S>5100</S> should carry<S>1308</S> any vessel<S>4632</S> through<S>1223</S> the temple<S>2411</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he taught<S>1321</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Is it<S>1125</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S>,<S>3754</S> My<S>3450</S> house<S>3624</S> shall be called<S>2564</S> of all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> the house<S>3624</S> of prayer<S>4335</S>? but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> have made<S>4160</S> it<S>846</S> a den<S>4693</S> of thieves<S>3027</S>. <sup>of all: or, an house of prayer for all nations</sup>
And<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> chief priests<S>749</S> heard<S>191</S> it, and<S>2532</S> sought<S>2212</S> how<S>4459</S> they might destroy<S>622</S> him<S>846</S>: for<S>1063</S> they feared<S>5399</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> all<S>3956</S> the people<S>3793</S> was astonished<S>1605</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3753</S> even<S>3796</S> was come<S>1096</S>, he went<S>1607</S> out of<S>1854</S> the city<S>4172</S>.
And<S>2532</S> in the morning<S>4404</S>, as they passed by<S>3899</S>, they saw<S>1492</S> the fig tree<S>4808</S> dried up<S>3583</S> from<S>1537</S> the roots<S>4491</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Peter<S>4074</S> calling to remembrance<S>363</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Master<S>4461</S>, behold<S>2396</S>, the fig tree<S>4808</S> which<S>3739</S> thou cursedst<S>2672</S> is withered away<S>3583</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Have<S>2192</S> faith<S>4102</S> in God<S>2316</S>. <sup>Have: or, Have the faith of God</sup>
For<S>1063</S> verily<S>281</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, That<S>3754</S> whosoever<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> shall say<S>2036</S> unto this<S>5129</S> mountain<S>3735</S>, Be thou removed<S>142</S>, and<S>2532</S> be thou cast<S>906</S> into<S>1519</S> the sea<S>2281</S>; and<S>2532</S> shall<S>1252</S> not<S>3361</S> doubt<S>1252</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> heart<S>2588</S>, but<S>235</S> shall believe<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> those things which<S>3739</S> he saith<S>3004</S> shall come to pass<S>1096</S>; he<S>846</S> shall have<S>2071</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> he saith<S>2036</S>.
Therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, What<S>3745</S> things<S>3956</S> soever<S>302</S> ye desire<S>154</S>, when ye pray<S>4336</S>, believe<S>4100</S> that<S>3754</S> ye receive<S>2983</S> them, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5213</S> shall have<S>2071</S> them.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> ye stand<S>4739</S> praying<S>4336</S>, forgive<S>863</S>, if<S>1536</S> ye have<S>2192</S> ought<S>1536</S> against<S>2596</S> any<S>5100</S>: that<S>2443</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> also<S>2532</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> may forgive<S>863</S> you<S>5213</S> your<S>5216</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> ye<S>5210</S> do<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> forgive<S>863</S>, neither<S>3761</S> will<S>863</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S> which<S>3588</S> is in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> forgive<S>863</S> your<S>5216</S> trespasses<S>3900</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they come<S>2064</S> again<S>3825</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S>: and<S>2532</S> as he<S>846</S> was walking<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, there come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> the chief priests<S>749</S>, and<S>2532</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>, and<S>2532</S> the elders<S>4245</S>,
And<S>2532</S> say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, By<S>1722</S> what<S>4169</S> authority<S>1849</S> doest thou<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>? and<S>2532</S> who<S>5101</S> gave<S>1325</S> thee<S>4671</S> this<S>5026</S> authority<S>1849</S> to<S>2443</S> do<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>?
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I will<S>1905</S> also<S>2504</S> ask<S>1905</S> of you<S>5209</S> one<S>1520</S> question<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> answer<S>611</S> me<S>3427</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will tell<S>2046</S> you<S>5213</S> by<S>1722</S> what<S>4169</S> authority<S>1849</S> I do<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>. <sup>question: or, thing</sup>
The baptism<S>908</S> of John<S>2491</S>, was<S>2258</S> it from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, or<S>2228</S> of<S>1537</S> men<S>444</S>? answer<S>611</S> me<S>3427</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they reasoned<S>3049</S> with<S>4314</S> themselves<S>1438</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, If<S>1437</S> we shall say<S>2036</S>, From<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>; he will say<S>2046</S>, Why<S>1302</S> then<S>3767</S> did ye<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> believe<S>4100</S> him<S>846</S>?
But<S>235</S> if<S>1437</S> we shall say<S>2036</S>, Of<S>1537</S> men<S>444</S>; they feared<S>5399</S> the people<S>2992</S>: for<S>1063</S> all<S>537</S> men counted<S>2192</S> John<S>2491</S>, that<S>3754</S> he was<S>2258</S> a prophet<S>4396</S> indeed<S>3689</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they answered<S>611</S> and said<S>3004</S> unto Jesus<S>2424</S>, We<S>1492</S> cannot<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S>. And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> answering<S>611</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Neither<S>3761</S> do I<S>1473</S> tell<S>3004</S> you<S>5213</S> by<S>1722</S> what<S>4169</S> authority<S>1849</S> I do<S>4160</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
